name: Snake Snafu
description:
Snake Snafu is a 2 player game which can be played locally(hotseat) or online. A maximum of 3 players can play simultaneously. Snake Snafu has been designed and created primarily for a 2 Player experience. Single player mode may feel somewhat empty.

Game by orange08: http://orange08games.blogspot.com/
Multiplayer by YellowAfterlife: http://yellowafterlife.itch.io/
Music by JappeJJ: http://jappejj.newgrounds.com/
